name: Turkey Zucchini Enchiladas
instructions: Cook turkey if uncooked, and cut into small pieces.
Heat oil over medium heat in skillet.
Add onion and garlic; cook 3-4 minutes until tender.
Add zucchini, 2 Tbsp water, cumin and oregano.
Cover, cook and stir over medium heat 10 minutes or until zucchini is tender.
Add to turkey, stir in cheese.
Spoon 1/4 cups filling in center and roll up.
Place seam side down in pan.
Brush top with green chile sauce.
Can top with cheese and cook a few more minutes.
If you donâ€™t want to use the green sauce you can probably use salsa.
